      • drawRect

        public static void drawRect(int bmp,
            int color,
            int x,
            int y,
            int width,
            int height,
            int mode)
        fill solid rectangle to bmp.
        Parameters:
        bmp - handle value, that returned by lockBitmap.
        color - the color to fill, formatted: 0xAARRGGBB, AA: alpha value.
        x -
        y -
        width -
        height -
        mode -
        0: mix color by source pixels with alpha channel.
        1: replace pixels.

      • dibGet

        public static int dibGet(int dib,
         int width,
         int height)
        create or resize dib, and reset all pixels in dib.
        if dib is 0, function create a new dib object.
        otherwise function resize the dib object.

      • dibFree

        public static int dibFree(int dib)
        free dib object.

      • Init

        public static void Init(Activity act)
        global initialize function. it load JNI library and write some data to memory.
        Parameters:
        act - Activity object, must be called super.onCreate().

        public static void default_config()
        reset to default configure.

      • ToDIBPoint

        public static void ToDIBPoint(Matrix mat,
              float[] ppoint,
              float[] dpoint)
        map PDF point to DIB point.
        Parameters:
        mat - Matrix object defined scale, rotate, tranlate operations.
        ppoint - input point in PDF coordinate system. [x, y]
        dpoint - output point in DIB coordinate system. [x, y]

      • ToPDFPoint

        public static void ToPDFPoint(Matrix mat,
              float[] dpoint,
              float[] ppoint)
        map DIB point to PDF point.
        Parameters:
        mat - Matrix object defined scale, rotate, tranlate operations.
        dpoint - input point in DIB coordinate system. [x, y]
        ppoint - output point in PDF coordinate system. [x, y]

      • ToDIBRect

        public static void ToDIBRect(Matrix mat,
             float[] prect,
             float[] drect)
        map PDF rectangle to DIB rectangle.
        Parameters:
        mat - Matrix object defined scale, rotate, tranlate operations.
        prect - input rect in PDF coordinate system. [left, top, right, bottom]
        drect - output rect in DIB coordinate system. [left, top, right, bottom]

      • ToPDFRect

        public static void ToPDFRect(Matrix mat,
             float[] drect,
             float[] prect)
        map DIB rectangle to PDF rectangle.
        Parameters:
        mat - Matrix object defined scale, rotate, tranlate operations.
        drect - input rect in DIB coordinate system. [left, top, right, bottom]
        prect - output rect in PDF coordinate system. [left, top, right, bottom]

      • ToDIBPoint

        public static void ToDIBPoint(float ratio,
              int dib_h,
              float[] ppoint,
              float[] dpoint)
        map PDF point to DIB point.
        Parameters:
        ratio - scale value apply to page rendering.
        dib_h - height of render bitmap.
        ppoint - input point in PDF coordinate system. [x, y]
        dpoint - output point in DIB coordinate system. [x, y]

      • ToPDFPoint

        public static void ToPDFPoint(float ratio,
              int dib_h,
              float[] dpoint,
              float[] ppoint)
        map DIB point to PDF point.
        Parameters:
        ratio - scale value apply to page rendering.
        dib_h - height of render bitmap.
        dpoint - input point in DIB coordinate system. [x, y]
        ppoint - output point in PDF coordinate system. [x, y]

             int dib_h,
             float[] prect,
             float[] drect)
        map PDF rectangle to DIB rectangle.
        Parameters:
        ratio - scale value apply to page rendering.
        dib_h - height of render bitmap.
        prect - input rect in PDF coordinate system. [left, top, right, bottom]
        drect - output rect in DIB coordinate system. [left, top, right, bottom]

      • ToPDFRect

        public static void ToPDFRect(float ratio,
             int dib_h,
             float[] drect,
             float[] prect)
        map DIB rectangle to PDF rectangle.
        Parameters:
        ratio - scale value apply to page rendering.
        dib_h - height of render bitmap.
        drect - input rect in DIB coordinate system. [left, top, right, bottom]
        prect - output rect in PDF coordinate system. [left, top, right, bottom]
